notes: Played through one scenario, no issues at all.
title: Mansions of Madness

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Ironlake Mobile x86/MMX/SSE2
notes:
Initially got "d3d11: failed to create D3D11 device (0x80004005)" error, in ".local/share/Steam/steamapps/common/" you find a Proton folder and in that folder will be a sample "user_settings.sample.py" file that you need to rename to "user_settings.py". Edit the file and uncomment ""PROTON_USE_WINED3D": "1",". You may need to restart.

I spent considerable time searching so hope this helps someone.
title: Mansions of Madness

notes: Played through the Astral Alchemy scenario with no issues
title: Mansions of Madness
